title: Pat Flynn from Have Heart and Fiddlehead
itunes:title: Pat Flynn from Have Heart and Fiddlehead
description:
Episode 338 - Yes! Finally, we have Pat Flynn from Have Heart and Fiddlehead on the show. He's been on my guest list for quite awhile and it's nice to tick him off. We go deep into his life as a teacher, unexpected outcomes and being encouraging to younger kids in the scene. We go everywhere and it was super fun. Check it out! Visit Rockabilia and use the code PCJABBERJAW for 10% off your order!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
